## MutateFunction type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type MutateFunction<TData = unknown, TError = unknown, TVariables = void> = (
    variables: TVariables,
    options?: MutateOptions<TData, TError, TVariables>,
) => Promise<TData>;
```
